description:
DESCRIPTION

AV Creative Director - MGM+ Creative Services  
  
Position Overview:  
Embark on an exhilarating creative journey as the AV Creative Director at MGM+! This pivotal role places you at the helm of our AV universe domestically and internationally, steering projects that span premium television, streaming content. As the leader behind our promotional campaigns, sales reels, and other marketing materials, you'll weave together creative brilliance and technical mastery to craft content that captivates audiences across all platforms.  
We're seeking a true creative with extensive experience in high-level audiovisual production, including premium television and/or theatrical content. Your expertise in crafting compelling narratives through various mediums will set the gold standard for MGM+'s audiovisual content. This is your chance to leave an indelible mark on the entertainment landscape, leading innovative projects that resonate across cultures and platforms.  
  
Ideal Candidate Profile:  
We're on the hunt for more than just a qualified professional â€“ we're seeking a creative virtuoso whose passion for audiovisual storytelling is palpable in every frame they produce. The ideal candidate lives and breathes creative excellence, their enthusiasm radiating through their work, interactions, and commitment to pushing boundaries.  
  
You should be able to articulate not just why you're passionate about this role, but how your unique creative vision will propel MGM+ to new heights of success in the premium entertainment space. Your energy should be contagious, inspiring teams to reach for the stars and turning even the most ambitious projects into reality.  
If you're ready to make your mark on the global entertainment stage, leading with creativity, innovation, and enthusiasm across premium television, streaming, and beyond, then this role at MGM+ is your next big break. Join us in shaping the future of audiovisual content and let your creative spirit soar!  
  
Key job responsibilities  
Key Responsibilities:  
Creative Vision & Strategy  

* Define and implement MGM+'s creative vision across all audiovisual platforms
* Develop innovative concepts for promotional campaigns, trailers, and marketing materials for premium television and streaming content
* Drive creative excellence through compelling storytelling and emerging technologies
* Create comprehensive strategies that align with MGM+'s brand and business objectives
* Translate complex ideas into engaging audiovisual experiences

Production Leadership & Execution  

* Direct high-profile projects from concept through delivery, including video campaigns, trailers, and TV spots
* Oversee technical production aspects including editing, sound design, and visual effects
* Lead creative reviews and provide strategic direction for all deliverables
* Manage live shoot productions and Electronic Press Kit (EPK) development
* Guide creation of digital assets for social media and online platforms

  
Team & Resource Management  

* Lead and mentor creative teams of designers, producers, and technical specialists
* Optimize workflows and resource allocation across multiple concurrent projects
* Manage departmental budgets and production timelines effectively
* Foster team growth and innovation through professional development
* Collaborate with external agencies and vendors on complex projects

Technical Excellence & Innovation  

* Maintain expertise in industry-standard software and emerging technologies
* Oversee quality control for all visual and audio elements
* Guide technical specifications for various delivery platforms
* Drive adoption of innovative production techniques
* Monitor industry trends and implement innovative solutions

Stakeholder & Brand Management  

* Present creative concepts and campaigns to executive leadership
* Collaborate across departments to ensure unified brand messaging
* Build and maintain relationships with key industry partners
* Ensure brand consistency across domestic and international markets
* Align creative output with business objectives and market needs

Qualifications:  

* Bachelor's degree in Film, Media Studies, Digital Arts, or related field; Master's degree preferred
* 10+ years experience in high-level A/V production, including 5+ years in a leadership role
* Proven track record in premium television, streaming content, and/or theatrical marketing
* Demonstrated success in developing promotional campaigns for premium entertainment content
* Extensive experience with live shoots and Electronic Press Kit (EPK) production
* Impressive portfolio showcasing a diverse range of A/V projects
* Mastery of industry-standard software (e.g., Adobe Creative Suite, Final Cut Pro, Pro Tools)
* Exceptional leadership, communication, and project management prowess
* Firm understanding of digital media trends and content creation
* Expertise in managing international projects and navigating diverse market needs

Required Skills and Attributes:  

* Infectious creative thinking that inspires and elevates teams
* Razor-sharp problem-solving abilities and decisive leadership
* Unparalleled time management skills and organizational finesse
* Thrives under pressure, consistently delivering excellence on tight deadlines
* Collaborative spirit with the ability to forge strong relationships across teams and industries
* Agility in adapting to rapidly evolving technologies and industry trends
* Exceptional aesthetic judgment that consistently produces creative excellence
* Cultural acumen to tailor creative approaches for diverse international markets
* Deep understanding of premium entertainment marketing principles and best practices
* Extensive network within the entertainment industry and agency landscape
* Proven ability to translate marketing expertise across various content platforms
* Genuine passion for the entertainment industry and creative content production
* Infectious enthusiasm that galvanizes team members and stakeholders
* Resilient positivity that drives projects forward, even in challenging situations

  
A day in the life  
Your day as an MGM+ AV Creative Director begins with a burst of creative energy as you arrive at the office, cold brew in hand, already bubbling with fresh ideas for the new psychological thriller series. The shoot team's texts light up your phone with exciting BTS footage they've captured for the EPK. The morning kicks off with a creative review alongside the creative services leadership team. Then, diving into the season finale promo cut for FROM. You expertly guide your editors through crucial tweaks, enhancing tension and perfecting sound
  
The day flows into a dynamic check-in with marketing team, where you refine that brilliant TikTok campaign you conceptualized. The storyboards shine, and collaborative brainstorming leads to even more innovative transitions. During lunch, you meet with the Motion GFX lead to review composites for the adventure series launch. While the holographic elements impress, your creative vision pushes for even more spectacular effects, suggesting subtle particle enhancements for transitions. Your afternoon includes a call with the London office, carefully navigating cultural nuances and technical requirements for international campaign adaptations while maintaining the creative message's impact across all markets.  
The day continues with preparation for tomorrow's live shoot, coordinating with your DP on shot lists, lighting designs, and prepping for the A-list talent involved. Every minute of planning is crucial for the shoot's success.  
Before wrapping up, you dedicate time to mentoring a promising junior creative, sharing industry insights and drawing inspiration from their fresh perspective. The day concludes with the exciting news that your team's season premiere campaign has achieved amazing ratings, sending you home with your mind already racing with ideas for tomorrow's creative challenges.  
As a director, creative innovator, mentor, and project manager all rolled into one, you've masterfully juggled multiple high-stakes projects while keeping your team inspired and pushing creative boundaries. It's an exhausting yet exhilarating role that perfectly suits your passionate drive for excellence in premium entertainment promotion.  
  
About the team  
MGM+ Creative Services: Where Vision Meets Execution  
  
The MGM+ Creative Services department stands as a powerhouse of creative innovation, strategically structured into four specialized units that work in seamless harmony to deliver premium entertainment marketing content. Under the strategic guidance of the Head of Brand Creative, each unit brings its unique expertise to the table while collaborating to maintain MGM+'s high-end brand identity.  
  
Production Management Unit  
The backbone of creative operations, this team masterfully orchestrates the logistics behind every project. From managing budgets and timelines to coordinating with external vendors and talent, they ensure smooth execution of all creative initiatives. Their expertise in resource allocation, scheduling, and project tracking keeps campaigns running efficiently from concept to delivery.  
  
Motion Graphics Unit  
This dynamic team brings stories to life through stunning visual artistry. Specializing in 2D and 3D animation, visual effects, and dynamic typography, they create captivating show packages, network branding elements, and promotional graphics that elevate MGM+'s content across all platforms. Their technical expertise ensures our visual language remains contemporary and compelling.  
  
Print/Digital Design Unit  
Masters of visual communication, this team crafts the static visual elements that represent MGM+'s brand across all touchpoints. From key art and print advertisements to digital banners and social media assets, they ensure consistent, premium visual storytelling that resonates across traditional and digital landscapes. Their work forms the fundamental building blocks of MGM+'s visual identity.  
  
AV Editorial Unit  
The storytellers behind our promotional content, this team crafts compelling narratives through video and sound. Specializing in trailers, promos, and sizzle reels, they combine technical expertise with creative flair to create engaging content that captures audiences' attention and drives viewership. Their mastery of pacing, music, and narrative structure helps bring MGM+'s content to life.  
  
Each unit is led by an experienced team leader who reports directly to the Head of Brand Creative, ensuring consistent communication, strategic alignment, and creative excellence across all projects. This structure allows for both specialized focus within each unit and seamless collaboration across teams, resulting in cohesive, high-impact creative campaigns that strengthen MGM+'s position as a premium entertainment destination.

description:
**Job Summary:**
We are looking for a UX Designer and Strategist to play a key role in shaping the user experience of our websites. This role will work on projects ranging from individual component designs to full section redesigns while also managing the day-to-day operations of our design system. You'll collaborate with digital strategy, product, technology, and content strategy teams to create user-centered, accessible, and data-driven solutions that enhance our website's usability and engagement.
  
  
**Job Responsibilities:**

* As a member of the Marketing & Technology Product Team, you will:
* Lead UX Strategy & Design: Develop and execute UX strategies for projects of varying scope, from individual UI components to multi-page experiences.
* Design System Management: Maintain and evolve the design system, ensuring consistency and usability across the website.
* Accessibility & Inclusive Design: Ensure all designs align with ADA/WCAG guidelines, creating experiences that are accessible to users of all abilities.
* Data-Driven & Customer Journey Design: Use user research, A/B testing, and analytics to inform design decisions, ensuring a seamless customer journey.
* Collaboration & Stakeholder Alignment: Partner with cross-functional teams, including digital strategy, product, engineering, and content teams, to align UX decisions with business goals.
* Wireframing & Prototyping: Create wireframes, user flows, and high-fidelity design concepts, ensuring intuitive and engaging user experiences.
* Usability Testing & Research: Conduct usability testing and A/B testing to validate design decisions and iterate based on insights.
* Design Execution: Work across strategy and execution, from conceptualizing UX improvements to designing detailed, ready-for-development UI components

**Skills & Experience:**

* Five plus (5)+ years in UX/UI design, with experience in both strategic and tactical aspects of design.
* Proven experience designing user-friendly digital experiences, preferably for large-scale websites.
* Experience in usability testing, user research, and A/B testing.
* Strong understanding of customer journey mapping and ability to design with data-driven insights.
* Deep knowledge of accessibility best practices (ADA, WCAG compliance) and inclusive design.
* Proficiency in Figma for wireframing, prototyping, and design system management.
* Understanding of front-end development principles (HTML, CSS, and how designs translate into code).
* Ability to balance big-picture UX strategy with hands-on design execution.
* Comfortable working with multiple teams, including product managers, developers, and content strategists.

Familiarity with Storybook (preferred) to manage design-to-development workflows.
